settings.json from this directory is not used automatically,
you need to copy it to something like this:
c:\Users\York\AppData\Roaming\Code\User\settings.json

It's included in git repository to be able to quickly setup
VS code when you pull from repository on a new PC.

keybindings.json are located here:
c:\Users\York\AppData\Roaming\Code\User\keybindings.json
